Wait, What? You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Confused]{Confused}> Melee
Don't hit Me! Until the end of your next turn, each time you miss with a ranged attack targeting enemy adjacent to any of your allies, you hit one of those adjacent allies instead (determined randomly by the GM). Ranged
Pinched Nerve Until healed, you take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to land Speed and are clumsy 1. Unarmed
Mental Slip You are controlled by the target until the end of your next turn. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #4
